thread.title: My Stay
thread.title_full: My Stay - Review of Club Quarters Hotel, World Trade Center, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: M4969RCangelc
title: My Stay
text:
It turned out very nice for the wife, as it was the first time to visit the big apple. Had no idea that we we're staying so close to ground zero. I would recommend this stay to family and friends. Will do this stay again.
Room Tip: Had no bath towels on arrival. Other than that it was very nice See more room tips
